quote: One glance he gave, one little smile at parting—it was but for a moment; but therein I read, or thought I read, a meaning that kindled in my heart a brighter flame of hope than had ever yet arisen.
quote_letters: ONE GLANCE HE GAVE ONE LITTLE SMILE AT PARTING-IT WAS BUT FOR A MOMENT BUT THEREIN I READ OR THOUGHT I READ A MEANING THAT KINDLED IN MY HEART A BRIGHTER FLAME OF HOPE THAN HAD EVER YET ARISEN
